Title: The Choice
Writer: Roger Drew (teleplay), Ian Martin (teleplay), Armando Iannucci (story), Roger Drew (story), Ian Martin (story), Armando Iannucci (creator)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: Following POTUS' new stance on abortion, Selina is forced to reconsider hers. Jonah starts a consulting firm outlet called Ryantology. Kent flirts with Sue.
